And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Draw Out <S%G501><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Carry <S%G5342><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Master Of The Feast. <S%G755><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Carried It. <S%G5342><s%>

<S%G5613><s%> But When <S%G1161><s%> Had Tasted <S%G1089><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Master Of The Feast <S%G755><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Water <S%G5204><s%> Wine <S%G3631><s%> That Had Become, <S%G1096><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Knew Not <S%G1492><s%> Whence <S%G4159><s%> It Is, <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> but The <S%G1161><s%> Servants <S%G1249><s%> Knew <S%G1492><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Had Drawn <S%G501><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Water, <S%G5204><s%> Calls <S%G5455><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Master Of The Feast <S%G755><s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> Did <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Beginning <S%G746><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Signs <S%G4592><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Cana <S%G2580><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Manifested <S%G5319><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1391><s%> His Glory; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Believed <S%G4100><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples. <S%G846><s%>

After <S%G3326><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> He Went Down <S%G2597><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> , Capernaum, <S%G2584><s%> He <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3384><s%> His Mother <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> His <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> They Abode <S%G3306><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Days. <S%G2250><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Near <S%G1451><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Passover <S%G3957><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Went Up <S%G305><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Found <S%G2147><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G2411><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Sold <S%G4453><s%> Oxen <S%G1016><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sheep <S%G4263><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Doves, <S%G4058><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Money Changers <S%G2773><s%> Sitting; <S%G2521><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> To Those Who <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Doves <S%G4058><s%> Sold <S%G4453><s%> He Said, <S%G2036><s%> Take <S%G142><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> <S%G1782><s%> Hence; <S%G3361><s%> Make Not <S%G4160><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Of My Father <S%G3450><s%> A House <S%G3624><s%> Of Merchandise. <S%G1712><s%>

<S%G3415><s%> And Remembered <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples <S%G846><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Written <S%G1125><s%> It Is, <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Zeal <S%G2205><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3624><s%> Of Thine House <S%G4675><s%> Has Eaten Up <S%G2719><s%> Me. <S%G3165><s%>

Said <S%G2036><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> Forty <S%G5062><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Six <S%G1803><s%> Years <S%G2094><s%> Was Building <S%G3618><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3485><s%> This Temple, <S%G3778><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Wilt Raise Up <S%G1453><s%> It? <S%G846><s%>
<S%G1565><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Spoke <S%G3004><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G3485><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4983><s%> Of His Body. <S%G846><s%>

When <S%G3753><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> He Was Raised Up <S%G1453><s%> From Among The <S%G1537><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> Remembered <S%G3415><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples <S%G846><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> He Had Said <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Believed <S%G4100><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scripture <S%G1124><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Had Spoken <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

<S%G5613><s%> But When <S%G1161><s%> He Was <S%G2258><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> At <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Passover, <S%G3957><s%> At <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Feast, <S%G1859><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Believed <S%G4100><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> His Name, <S%G846><s%> Beholding <S%G2334><s%> His <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Signs <S%G4592><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> He Was Doing. <S%G4160><s%>
